idea:
The demand for original content is very high due to the OTT explosion aided by rapid 4G deployment, cheaper handsets, attractive data plans and rural upsurge. There is a huge gap between demand and supply of content and the platforms are racing to add subscribers by investing in original programming to enhance their content repository. Also, very few players offer regional content where the demand is exploding. Lastly, digital advertising is still at a nascent stage with most monies deployed to Social media . There is a clear need for better client solutions that does not just get the advertisers content across but also ensures it is helping to achieve their business objectives .

EMVEEBEE Media Pvt Ltd proposes to develop & produce interesting original content under fiction and non-fiction categories across popular genres. The company will create unique concepts & stories which are relevant to millennials and can be adapted across various media platforms in Hindi as well regional languages such as Bengali, Marathi, Telugu, Gujarati, Punjabi etc. The Branded Content focus is on creating compelling propositions which helps brands to reach their focus group in the most effective manner and achieve expected results through our branded content solutions.
name: EMVEEBEE MEDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Entity Gaming  is an esport organization that owns teams of professional video game players. These teams play video game tournaments online and offline across the globe. 

Entity Gaming also hosts online and offline video game events, tournaments.
name: ENTITY GAMING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
URBAN POD is India's first of its kind boutique 'Pod' Hotel, catering to business and leisure travelers alike.


The 'Next Generation Smart Hotel', with its futuristic concept, URBAN POD offers great value, without compromising on comfort, quality and feel, while offering a unique experience to our guests.


URBAN POD Hotel concept is a highly scalable business model and efficient in optimizing real estate space and creates more than 400% additional Hotel beds as compared to conventional room of a standard Hotel.


Our unique boutique 'Pod' Hotel concept  has won us numerous awards in the last 3 years, under Innovation & several other categories.
name: URBAN POD PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Trabaajo is a Voice Based Virtual Assistant, that aims to automate the entire process of the HR. Enabled with a robust AI and EI Algorithm, Trabaajo distinguishes itself as a software solution that is capable of automatically managing the HR Department. 


Trabaajo has proved in its Pre Beta and Beta Testing, that it is capable of not just automating tasks but is capable of suggesting and recommending solutions / information / data to the end user. With its all for nothing pricing model, Trabaajo aims to be the only interface between the company and a candidate irrespective of geography domain and position. Trabaajo is also instrumental and adds a pivotal value when new skills are to be searched for , analysed and implemented.
name: TRABAAJO SOFTWARE LABS PRIVATE LIMITED
